Protected Member Functions

MGGLAttrib & set_glattrib (const MGGLAttrib &gel2)

Protected Attributes

int m_flag
 =-3:undefined, will be inheritted.

Detailed Description

MGGLAttrib is an abstract class which defines the enum of undefined, disabled.

Subclass of MGGLAttrib can use m_flag as a part of its own class attributes. In this case, -3 and -2 must be avoided. -3 and -2 do not appear in OpenGL attributes.

Member Function Documentation

void MGGLAttrib::drawAttrib ( bool  no_color = false  )  const [inline, virtual]

draw GLAttribute process.

Parameters:
no_color if true, color attribute will be neglected.

Member Data Documentation

int MGGLAttrib::m_flag [protected]

=-3:undefined, will be inheritted.

=-2:disabled. =other:each subclass's data(enabled).
